data.actual_result: The file name is cut off (The "a" in happens if using the above file name)
data.expected_result: The file name is truncated correctly (With ... or some other way of truncating it)
data.short_description: Long file names get cut off in the file upload embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a file with a relatively long name (I used this_is_a_really_long_file_to_seewhathappens  [Without the space])
